name: Wide-Screen FFn
description:
Basically "Fanfiction.net - Better FFNET" by Sirius (https://userstyles.org/styles/66837/fanfiction-net-better-ffnet) with font sizes restored to site defaults and pictures re-enabled.

In short, wide-screen FFn.

This isn't professional at all, and I'm only putting it up here so that I can access it from other computers.
